title: Beef casserole with redcurrants
ingredients: ['40g (1 1/2 oz) butter', '900g (2 lb) casserole beef steak, cut into 2.5cm (1 in) cubes', '3 rashers rindless streaky bacon, chopped', '2 large onions, chopped', '110g (4 oz) button mushrooms, thickly sliced', '2 red peppers, seeded and chopped', '170g (6 oz) frozen redcurrants', '2 1/2 tablespoons plain flour', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 tablespoons soft brown sugar', '1 pinch ground mace', '1 pinch ground allspice', '300ml (1/2 pt) GuinnessÂ®', '2 bay leaves', '3 tablespoons finely chopped fresh parsley']
